resources.string: The one with darts...\nNot the one with a bat...

The goal of the game is to close out 15-20 and bullseye, and end the game with more points. 

 To close out a section, you have to hit it 3 times. The outer ring counts as double, inner ring counts as triple. The outer Bullseye counts as a single hit, and the inner is a double. 

Once you've closed out a section, any additional hits count as points (i.e. hitting 15 gives you 15 points, 20 would be 20 points, outer bullseye 25 and inner 50.) 

A section that's been closed out by both players may not be scored on.
